title: BMS ECE or PES RR ECE
content:
I have got ECE in PES RR campus through pessat. I will also get ECE or AIML (no guarantee) through comedk. Ik everyone will suggest go for PES. But.....I have this strong gut feeling that my life will become hell there. 

I have been in strict schools and my mental health is fucked up. I don't want to relive it again. That doesn't mean I can compromise on placements. 

I want a good..... decent college life and good placement also. Pls give me your opinions

comments.body:
Which soul will tell you to go for pes EceðŸ˜­
Go for bms ece/aiml fees is cheaper too

omggg thank you so much!!!!!!!! I needed this

BTW how is college life in PES????

Is it actually hell?
Use the search bar there are loads of posts regarding college life (i cant say anything on my own i am joinin this year)
It is definitely not hell but at the same time it isn't as bad as this subreddit makes it seem. As someone else said - there are multiple comments by me and others on this topic.
